attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: to lower benifits for the unemployed especially those who do not want to work including housing benifit and poll tax benifit,no work no pay why should people who care with jobs pay for the lazy and also people talk about poor families is the reason that they spend benifit money on drink/fags/drugs not the real reason there is still child poverty nobody addreses this issue

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
